name: html-cdn-example
description: Example App for the Infineon Design System Stencil Components using plain HTML and a CDN

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html favicon.svg dist/

author: Pfaff Fabian <fabian.pfaff@infineon.com>
